text: I attended this course to acquire the relevant knowledge and skills in photography. The trainer, Mr Andy Lau is very proficient and knowledgeable in what he taught the class. He is indeed a professional in this field.

Attended the Smartphone Photography Essentials with the intention of just completing a course, but left with bountiful knowledge on taking better quality photos with just my smartphone. Learnt so much such as framing and composition, editing my photos using ready and available apps on my phone and Iâ€™ve learnt to be more observant to my surroundings to furthur enhance my photos. Thanks Andy for the great time! Glad I took the time to attend this interactive and hands on course
More people should be aware of the course. Andy the trainer is extremely knowledgable in this field. Very friendly trainer. Now we can take more cool and interesting photos!
it's a funs and interesting course, it teaches what I always leak and unsure when taking photos!
I went for the 3D Jelly flower Art design course through skill future. It was a great experience and I indeed enjoyed the course very much. I even did some flower jelly back home after the course.
